name: T1Autograph
summary: Simple signature capture using a built-in modal view or a view of your choice.
description:
Integrate smooth signature capture into your iOS app, with built-in support for Apple Pencil and 3D Touch.
It's simple to use, inexpensive, and has dead easy integration with Xcode.
            A demo application is available at the [T1Autograph page](http://tenonedesign.com/t1autograph.php)

license.text: Terms and conditions are available at http://tenonedesign.com/t1autograph.php
